casebody.data:
YATES CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC.
v.
Jeffrey L. BOSTIC, Michael Hartnett, and Joseph E. Bostic, Jr. No. 74P16. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Zeyland G. McKinney, Jr., Robbinsville, for Yates Construction Company, Inc. Eric W. Stiles, Robbinsville, for Yates Construction Company, Inc. D. Erik Albright, for Hartnett, Michael. Matthew N. Leerberg, Raleigh, for Hartnett, Michael. Christine L. Myatt, Greensboro, for Bostic, Jeffrey L. David S. Pokela, Greensboro, for Bostic, Jeffrey L.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th of March 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
